name: Fey Academy
description:
A personal project created during the 2020/2021 school year. Fey Academy is an adventure rpg. There are 8 different areas to explore. Combat uses a traditional turn based system against over 100 unique monsters. There are 16 different characters to choose from including a players own custom character. Each character has a unique spell set. Every character may also choose from a variety of different classes. Fey Academy also includes a small school to explore and get to know the different students and teachers.

Game mechanics and information, as well as questions that can arise when playing, may be found in the provided FAQ file.

All sprites were created by me except for the character portraits which were edited from the Harvest Moon franchise.

Almost all music was downloaded via the stock website Pixabay. Other tracks are ones which I do not own and were taken from Youtube.

This is a fan game and certain characters, ideas, imagery, and music are properties I do not own.
